text: The Gyeonggi Provincial Office of Education is the office of education for Gyeonggi Province, South Korea. The current superintendent is Lee Jae-jeong. It was established in 1956. == Superintendent == The current superintendent is Lee Jae-jeong. He took office in 2018 August. == Private School Purchase Programs == The department had a program where private schools in financial distress are bought by the department, with the schools becoming public after changes in administration. The department bought 9 such kindergartens in August 2019, to open in March 2020. == References == Category:Schools in Korea
title: Gyeonggi Provincial Office of Education
